titlestmt.titleproper: Lists of delegates to the Free Trade Convention 1828-1831
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012. Modified by Dot Porter in 2017.

did.unittitle: Lists of delegates to the Free Trade Convention

scopecontent.p: This volume contains lists of delegates to the Free Trade Convention held in Philadelphia in 1831, which opposed all tariffs on imported goods. The delegates from Pennsylvania appear to make up the majority of the volume, listing them by county. The back of the volume not only includes delegates from other states, but also some newspaper clippings related to the Convention.

accessrestrict.p: Access to this collection is restricted; please contact the holding institution for details.
